Advisory type name, proper ordering ensured (unknown, unspecified, other, enhancement, bugfix, security)

to_time.description: Filter applicable advisories (updates) by the latest publish time.

inventory_ids.description: List of inventory IDs to have baselines removed

subtotals.description: Some subtotals used by some endpoints

meta.description: Generic response fields (pagination params, filters etc.)

inventory_ids.description: Map of inventories to add to (true) or remove (false) from given baseline (optional)

epoch_required.description: VMaaS will check package_list and return error if we provide package_list without epochs

optimistic_updates.description: Search for updates of unknown package EVRAs.

third_party.description: Include content from \"third party\" repositories into the response, disabled by default.

info.description:
API of the Patch application on [console.redhat.com](https://console.redhat.com)

Syntax of the `filter[name]` query parameters is described in  [Filters documentation](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/patchman-engine/wiki/API-custom-filters)
